Metadata: Exotic aquatics on the move: lesson plans (CD-ROM)

This collection of classroom and field activities about non-native species in the marine environment is geared for students in grades 6 through 12. It was compiled by school teachers and education specialists after a series of Sea Grant-sponsored workshops held in WA, IL, IN, LA, and NY. Each CD-ROM includes an Adobe Acrobat Reader program. Print versions are also available. More information can be found at www.iisgcp.org/â€‹EXOTICSP.
